description: Represents an entity spawn during initial chunk generation

preprocessors.description:
preprocessors
Preprocess this object in-memory when it's loaded, run scripts using the variable 'Iris.getPreprocessorObject()' and modify properties about this object before it's used.
   
List<Script>

    
* Default Value is an empty list
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.
Must be a valid Script (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

spawns.description:
spawns
The entity spawns to add
   
List of EntitySpawns (Objects)

    
* Default Value is an empty list
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.

initialSpawns.description:
initialSpawns
The entity spawns to add initially. EXECUTES PER CHUNK!
   
List of EntitySpawns (Objects)

    
* Default Value is an empty list
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.

energyMultiplier.description:
energyMultiplier
The energy multiplier when calculating spawn energy usage
   
Number

    
* Default Value is 1.0

maxEntitiesPerChunk.description:
maxEntitiesPerChunk
This spawner will not spawn in a given chunk if that chunk has more than the defined amount of living entities.
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 1

anyOf.description:
timeBlock
The block of 24 hour time to contain this spawn in.
   
TimeBlock (Object)
Represents a time of day (24h time, not 12h am/pm). Set both to the same number for any time. If they are both set to -1, it will always be not allowed.
    
You can instead specify "snippet/time-block/some-name.json" to use a snippet file instead of specifying it here.
    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)

group

min

* Default Value is 16.0

max

oneOf.description: Spawns in cave-air and low light level areas

anyOf.description: Represents a time of day (24h time, not 12h am/pm). Set both to the same number for any time. If they are both set to -1, it will always be not allowed.

startHour.description:
startHour
The beginning hour. Set both to the same number for any time. If they are both set to -1, it will always be not allowed.
   
Number

    
* Default Value is 0.0

endHour.description:
endHour
The ending hour. Set both to the same number for any time. If they are both set to -1, it will always be not allowed.
   
Number

    
* Default Value is 0.0

anyOf.description: Represents a count of something per time duration

amount.description:
amount
The amount of things. Leave 0 for infinite (meaning always spawn whenever)
   
Integer

    
* Default Value is 0

anyOf.description:
per
The time interval. Leave blank for infinite 0 (meaning always spawn all the time)
   
Duration (Object)
Represents a combined duration. Fill each property to add time into a single duration
    
You can instead specify "snippet/duration/some-name.json" to use a snippet file instead of specifying it here.
    
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)

per

* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)
